# Edward Julian Nally

[[File:Edward Julian Nally (1923).jpg|thumb|right|100px|Nally in 1923]]
Edward Julian Nally (1859â€“1953) was a U.S. radio industrialist. Nally served as the vice president and general manager of American Marconi Company and was the first president of RCA between 1919 and 1923.
